product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description:
- Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g.
- Item part number: ER0583.
- Country of Origin: India.
- Department: womens.
- Item Weight: 3.9 g.
- Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters.
- Net Quantity: 2.00 count.
- Generic Name: Stud Earrings.
- Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 65 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner presents an elegant promotion for jewelry featuring a central product image of rose gold wreath stud earrings placed above the price section. The design includes a soft, feminine aesthetic with a flowing wave background made up of radial gradients and pastel overlays, giving the layout a smooth and delicate mood. The heading text (id: `heading`) uses a modern, sleek font in a muted rose gold hue, while the subheading text (id: `subheading`) is bold and dark lavender, providing a strong visual contrast. The price (id: `price`) is prominently displayed in bold typography. A call-to-action button (id: `cta_button`) in mauve with white text (id: `cta_text`) invites users to shop. 

**Color Palette:**
- Background Light Pink: `#FFF0F0`
- Gradient Pink Overlays: `#FFB6C1`, `#F5A9B8`
- Wave Overlay Colors: `#F8D0D0`, `#FFCCD5`
- Heading Text: `#C06C84`
- Subheading and Price Text: `#6C5B7B`
- CTA Button: `#C06C84`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases elegant earrings with a soft and feminine color palette dominated by rose gold and crystal white. The base metal is a luxurious rose gold (#F4A7A0), which lends warmth and sophistication. The gemstones are a bright, glistening white (#FFFFFF) with transparent facets that reflect light dynamically. The blush pink enamel details (#FBD1D3) on the petals soften the overall look and add a romantic touch. These colors blend smoothly through polished metalwork and precise stone placement, achieving harmony while highlighting each component. Ideal banner background colors include blush pink, ivory (#FFFFF0), and soft champagne (#F7E7CE) to enhance elegance.
